label: Strength
flavor: You imbue the item with ferocious strength.
level-8-spell: The item can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gPvtmKMRpg9I9D7H]{Earthbind} once per day as a primal spell.
level-14-spell: The item can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gPvtmKMRpg9I9D7H]{Earthbind} once per hour as a primal spell.
level-17-apex: When you invest the item, you either increase your Strength attribute by 1 or increase it to +4, whichever would give you a higher value. The item gains the apex trait.
level-20-spell: The item can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gPvtmKMRpg9I9D7H]{Earthbind} once per minute as a primal spell.
